titles.title: Hide Me, Lord, In Your Holiness

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hide me, Lord, in Your holiness!
Every sin I now confess.
Praise to You, forgiving Lord.
Hide me in Your holiness!
Hide me in Your holiness!
Chorus:
Hide me, hide me, hide me, Oh Lord.
Won't You hide me, hide me,
Hide me in Your holiness.
Hide me in Your holiness.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Take my life an offering.
All of me to You I bring.
Praise to You, Oh, spotless Lamb.
Hide me in Your holiness.
Hide me in Your holiness.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Escondeme en tu Santidad.
Todo pecado confieso ya.
¡Gloria a ti, Dios perdonador!
Escondeme en tu Santidad,
Escondeme en tu Santidad.(2x)

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Escondeme, escondeme, escondeme Señor,
Escondeme, escondeme
Escondeme en Tu Santidad.
Escondeme en Tu Santidad.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Toma mi vida como una ofrenda,
Todo mi ser la entrego a Ti.
¡Gloria a ti, cordero de Dios.
